CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the Warm-up task to MOT . CHI walks around and explores the toys
MOT lowers herself to the floor and looks at CHI
CHI sits on the floor next to MOT
CHI leans on MOT as she reaches for a toy on the floor
MOT picks up the toy duck and squeezes it
CHI pulls back and sits beside MOT
CHI reaches out for the football
<bef> MOT puts the toy car in front of CHI
CHI extends one arm and leans on MOT while looking down at the car
CHI looks up at the book
MOT opens the book briefly and then closes it
MOT looks at CHI and points to the picture
<aft> MOT starts to open the book
MOT points to a different picture
MOT looks at CHI and points to the book
MOT points to each letter in the book
CHI leans on MOT and looks at the book
MOT points at the book and looks at the picture
MOT takes something off of CHI's face
CHI looks at the book but not where MOT pointed
MOT points to the other picture
MOT points to the first picture
CHI reaches out for the toy duck
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box out and looks at CHI
CHI puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of the jack+in+the+box
CHI holds MOT's arm and looks at the jack+in+the+box
CHI pokes at the clown's eyes with her finger then pushes the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI push the clown into the box
CHI pulls her hand back and watches MOT
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box down in front of CHI
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes CHI's hand off the lid
CHI pulls back from the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts CHI's hand on the handle
CHI starts to turn the handle
CHI leans on MOT with her other hand
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
CHI lets go of the handle and puts her hand on the lid
CHI holds her hand on top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls her hand back and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box and CHI
CHI pushes the clown in the jack+in+the+box
MOT closes the jack+in+the+box the gets up and sits opposite CHI
CHI closes the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI winds the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the book open and points to a picture
CHI looks up at the book then down at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT points to a picture and looks at CHI
CHI looks up at the book
CHI releases the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
CHI closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box and bangs it with her hand
CHI winds the jack+in+the+box and holds the duck in her hand
MOT leans down on the floor near CHI
CHI pulls down the clown and tries to put the rubber duck into the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls back holding the duck and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT points to the top of clown's head
CHI puts the duck in the jack+in+the+box
MOT closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs the handle and starts to turn
MOT sits back and watches CHI
MOT picks up the book and opens it
MOT looks at the book then up at CHI
MOT leans down to help CHI turn the handle
CHI lets go of the handle
CHI sits back and watches MOT
CHI reaches down and turns the handle with MOT
CHI points to the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box then winds it
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
the jack+in+the+box pops and the duck comes out
CHI picks up the duck then puts her hand on the clown's head
MOT leans out of camera view
CHI pushes the clown in the box
CHI looks up at the paper
CHI starts to crawl to MOT
CHI sits on the floor and turns and looks up at the camera
MOT puts the paper in front of CHI
CHI looks down at the toy car then up at MOT
MOT holds out a pen to CHI
CHI turns her head and looks at the pen
MOT holds the pen out to CHI
CHI looks at the computer behind the desk
MOT gives the pen back to CHI
<6-7> MOT points off camera . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI rolls onto her back and looks up towards the ceiling
CHI rolls over slowly and starts to draw
CHI stops drawing pokes the car with the pen
MOT gets up on her knees and looks around the room
MOT sits on the floor across from CHI
CHI looks down at the floor then at MOT
CHI starts to crawl closer to the paper
MOT points to the paper and looks at CHI
CHI gives MOT the pen and holds up the paper
MOT puts the paper on the floor and writes
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI holds the pen as MOT writes
MOT lets go of the pen
CHI holds the pen and looks at MOT
MOT's action out of camera view
CHI looks up at MOT then towards the ceiling
MOT's action out of camera view
CHI looks up towards the camera
MOT takes a tissue out and wipes CHI's nose
CHI looks at MOT and waves her hand
MOT picks up the pen and the cap
INV enters the room to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT and has CHI sit at the table
MOT picks up the toys from Warm-up and has MOT sit near the door
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT
INV does not clear the toys from Small Scale off the table . MOT holds CHI on her lap
INV takes the object out of the drawer and puts it on the table
the balls on the end of the object are clumped together
CHI reaches out to touch the object
CHI stares at the object still reaching for it
INV removes all other toys from the table except the squeeze toy
INV separates the balls on the end of the object
CHI looks at the object and lowers her hand
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI and is very close to her
CHI wriggles around on MOT's lap
CHI stares at the object the turns away from the object
CHI wriggles around and moves all over MOT's lap
MOT tries to steady CHI and hold her
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . MOT sits on the floor and holds CHI on her lap
<aft> INV leaves the room with the toy box
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI looks down at the floor
MOT looks down at the floor then up at CHI
MOT gets up from the floor
CHI walks to the center of the room
MOT takes the ball box down from the desk
MOT lowers the box down to the floor
CHI holds the ball up on her shoulder
<bef> MOT moves the box out of the way
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI holds the ball in front of her and looks down at it
MOT bounces the ball on the floor
the ball rolls and hits CHI's foot
CHI starts to extend her hands as she watches MOT
MOT opens her legs and rolls the ball to CHI
MOT holds her hands out and looks at CHI
CHI rolls the ball to MOT
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
the ball stops before reaching CHI
CHI leans over and reaches for the ball
MOT pushes the ball towards CHI
CHI bounces the ball as she throws it to MOT
CHI watches MOT and throws her arms up excitedly
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI starts to catch the ball
the ball rolls away from CHI and back to MOT
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI catches the ball and bounces it over to MOT
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI catches the ball and bounces it back to MOT
MOT catches the ball and bounces it back to CHI
CHI catches the ball . <aft> CHI bounces the ball on the floor
the ball doesn't roll to MOT
MOT reaches out and grabs the ball
CHI looks at MOT and puts her hands up in the air
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI catches the ball . CHI bounces the ball back to MOT
MOT catches the ball and rolls it back to CHI
CHI catches the ball and bounces it back to MOT
<4-5 .> MOT bounces the ball to CHI
the ball rolls to MOT's leg
MOT gives the ball a push towards CHI
CHI reaches for the ball and looks at MOT
CHI throws the ball to MOT
CHI watches MOT and throws her arms up excitedly
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI bounces the ball on the floor
CHI throws her arms up excitedly and then watches MOT
MOT bounces the ball to CHI
CHI grabs the ball that bounced against her
MOT pushes the ball to CHI
MOT shakes her head and looks at CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT holds the ball up and looks at CHI
MOT throws the ball to CHI
<4> MOT leans forward and pushes the ball towards CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT catches the ball and throws it to CHI
CHI points to the paper on the floor
MOT puts the ball into the box
MOT puts the box on the desk
MOT holds the cloth up in front of CHI
MOT covers herself with the cloth
CHI moves back then lies on the floor and looks up at MOT
MOT covers herself with the cloth
CHI rolls over and starts to crawl towards MOT
<bef> MOT covers CHI with the cloth
CHI pulls the towel off her head
<bef> MOT covers CHI's head with the towel
MOT leans down and looks under the towel
MOT picks up the towel and covers herself with it
CHI stares up at the towel
CHI pulls the towel off MOT's head
CHI puts the towel on her head then hands it to MOT
MOT puts the towel over CHI
CHI starts to lift up the towel
CHI lifts up her arms , pulls herself up and looks at MOT
MOT leans back and pulls her torso up imitating CHI
CHI stands up and hugs MOT
CHI's foot gets caught on the paper on the floor
MOT picks up CHI and puts her near the table
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI takes a few steps forward
MOT crawls forward and throws the paper away
CHI comes over to the activity table
MOT's actions are out of camera view
CHI goes out of camera view
MOT puts the next box on the floor
MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI takes a step closer to the box
MOT takes a piece of paper our and puts it on the lid of the box
MOT holds a crayon out to CHI and looks at CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
CHI looks closely at the crayon
MOT taps the paper on top of the lid
CHI squats down a nd draws
CHI puts a hand down on the paper and draws with the other hand
CHI stops drawing and drops her crayon
MOT hands a different crayon to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT and draws briefly
CHI looks into the box of crayons
CHI looks into the box and reaches in
MOT picks up a crayon and hands it to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
CHI points to another crayon in the box
MOT holds another crayon out to CHI
CHI picks up a crayon from the floor
CHI looks down at the crayons in her hands
CHI taps a crayon on the paper and draws briefly . <aft> CHI draws
MOT holds the paper on the lid
CHI holds a crayon over the box
CHI drops a crayon in the box
CHI goes to put another crayon in the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI turns and looks at the door
CHI tries to get away from MOT
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI drops the crayons into the box
CHI drops a crayon into the box
MOT picks up the crayons . <4> MOT steadies CHI
MOT picks up the lid and covers the box
MOT puts the box up on the desk
<bef> CHI walks around the desk to see MOT's actions
CHI shrugs her shoulders then puts her hands on her hips as she watches MOT
MOT opens the box on the desk
<bef> MOT takes the book out of the box
MOT holds the book up and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the book and then turns to face the chair
MOT puts CHI on her lap
CHI looks down at the book
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at her
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks at the book and points to the picture on the other page
MOT turns the pages back towards the beginning
MOT points to the pictures in the book
CHI lifts up the page but doesn't turn it
CHI looks down at the book
CHI waves her hand on the book
MOT points to the picture on the previous page
CHI looks down at the book
MOT points to the other page
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks up at MOT then back at the book
CHI looks at the picture then faces straight ahead
CHI rocks back and forth on MOT's lap
CHI rocks back and forth on MOT's lap
MOT is referring to CHI's reflection on the opposite wall
CHI glances up at the opposite wall then looks down at the book
<$=1> MOT points to the picture in the book
CHI picks up the book and folds it
MOT gets the book and opens it
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks at the picture and leans forwards
CHI turns the pages of the book
CHI looks down at the book
CHI leans and looks at the door
End of PCI - Book . INV enters the room
